name: Oh! Shiny!
description:
A jam game made for the September 2020 VimJam. 

You are a kobold who is "exploring" a dungeon. Your goal is to take all of the treasure held inside.

The gameplay is bare bones, and there aren't any sound effects.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Right mouse button to attack and open chests
  • Press spacebar when you open a chest to continue

Credits:

90% of the art assets: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
Icons: https://kickpixel.itch.io/50fantasyicons
Music: https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
